channel.title: Pages on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Syniti Documentation

item.title: All Objects
item.description: All Objects Use this page to [Assign Contacts to Objects](../Use_Cases/Add_Target_Contacts_to_Objects.htm#Assign2). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > Object Contact Configuration in the Navigation pane. Click the Bulk User Object Assignment icon in the Page toolbar. Field Description Add Contact To Object Click to add the selected contact(s) to the selected Object(s).

item.title: Build Wave Comparison
item.description: Build Wave Comparison Use this page to [Synchronize Target Designs Across Waves](../Use_Cases/Synchronize_Target_Designs_Across_Waves.htm). NOTE: This page is only accessible if the current user is a member of the WebApp group Wavesynchronizer in Console or is assigned to a security role with access to the page. Refer to Set Security in System Administration for more information. To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar.

item.title: Bulk Contact Staging Area
item.description: Bulk Contact Staging Area Use this page to: - [Add Users to theStaging Area](../Use_Cases/Add_Target_Contacts_to_Objects.htm#Add) - [Assign a Position to Users](../Use_Cases/Add_Target_Contacts_to_Objects.htm#Assign) To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > Object Contact Configuration in the Navigation pane. Field Description Reset Staging Area Click to reset the staging area to clear the list of users to be assigned or removed from Objects.

item.title: Context Select
item.description: Context Select Use this page to select a context. See [Context, the Context Bar and Navigation in dspMigrate™](../../dspMigrate/Context_Navigation.htm) for more information. To access this page, click the context name in the Context bar. Field Description Wave Process Area Click the link to select the context, which is a combination of a Wave and Process Area. The selected context displays in the Context bar and is used throughout the dspMigrate™ components while working on a migration project.

item.title: Copy Object
item.description: Copy Object Use this page to [Copy an Object.](../Use_Cases/Copy_Elements.htm#Copy3) To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Elements > Object from the Navigation pane. Select an Object. Click the Copy Object icon in the Page toolbar. Field Description Original Object Name Displays the name of the Object selected on the Objects page to be copied.

item.title: Copy Object to Process Area
item.description: Copy Object to Process Area Use this page to [Copy an Object.](../Use_Cases/Copy_Elements.htm#Copy3) To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Waves in the Navigation pane. Click the Process Areas icon for a Wave. Click the Objects icon for a Process Area. Click the Copy icon. Field Description Wave Process Area ID

item.title: Copy Process Area
item.description: Copy Process Area Use this page to [Copy a Process Area](../Use_Cases/Copy_Elements.htm#Copy2). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Elements > Process Area in the Navigation pane. Select a Process Area. Click the Copy Process Area icon in the Page toolbar. Field Description Original Process Area Displays the name of the Process Area selected on the Process Area page to be copied.

item.title: Copy Wave
item.description: Copy Wave Use this page to [Copy a Wave](../Use_Cases/Copy_Elements.htm#Copy). To access this page: Click Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Click Waves in the Navigation pane. Select a Wave. Click the Copy Wave icon in the Page toolbar. Field Description Description Displays a description of the selected Wave to be copied.

item.title: List Value Configuration
item.description: List Value Configuration Use this page to [Configure List Box Values.](../Use_Cases/Configure_List_Box_Values.htm) To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > List Value Configuration in theNavigation pane. Field Description LIST Displays the name of the list and the name of the label that displays next to the list box on pages in dspMigrate™ Advanced Data Migration (ADM) components.

item.title: Milestone
item.description: Milestone This page is not used in this release.

item.title: Move Object to Process Area
item.description: Move Object to Process Area Use this page to [Move an Object](../Use_Cases/Copy_Elements.htm#Copy3) To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Waves in the Navigation pane. Click the Process Areas icon for a Wave. Click the Objects icon for a Process Area. Click the MOVE icon. Field Description Wave Process Area ID Displays the Wave Process Area ID.

item.title: Object Contacts
item.description: Object Contacts Use this page to [Add Contacts for an Object](../Use_Cases/Configure_Object.htm#Add). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Click Elements > Object in the Navigation pane. Click the Contact icon for an Object. Field Description CONTACT Displays the contact name. This contact may or may not be registered in the Platform.

item.title: Object Decision Comments
item.description: Object Decision Comments Use this page to .[Add Decisions for an Object](../Use_Cases/Configure_Object.htm#Add2). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Elements > Object in the Navigation pane. Click the Decisions icon for an Object. Click the Comments icon for a decision. Field Description NAME Displays the Object name.

item.title: Object Decisions H
item.description: Object Decisions H Object Decisions V Use this page to [Add Decisions for an Object](../Use_Cases/Configure_Object.htm#Add2). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Elements > Object in the Navigation pane. Click the Decisions icon for an Object. Field Description Approve Click to approve a record in Pending status.

item.title: Object History H
item.description: Object History H Object History V Use this page to [Track Object History](../Use_Cases/Configure_Object.htm#Track). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Elements > Object in the Navigation pane. Click the History icon for an Object. Field Description ID Displays the Object identity. Changes are tracked in ascending order, so the higher the number the more recent the change.

item.title: Objects H
item.description: Objects H Objects V (All Tabs) Use this page to [Create the Contexts for Migration Projects](../Use_Cases/Create_Contexts_for_Migration_Projects.htm) and [Configure an Object](../Use_Cases/Configure_Object.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Elements > Object in the Navigation pane. Field Description Copy Object Click to open the Copy Object page to create an object based on a copy of the selected Object.

item.title: Parameters
item.description: Parameters Use this page to [Set Parameters for Other Components](../Config/Set_Parameters_for_Other_Components.htm) This page has the following tabs: General tab Map tab Transform tab Construct tab Compare Settings tab To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > Parameters in the Navigation pane. General tab Field Description Application Information Application Name Displays the name of the component, Console.

item.title: Process Area
item.description: Process Area Use this page to [Add a Process Area](../Use_Cases/Add_Elements_Separately.htm#Add). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Elements > Process Area in the Navigation pane. Field Description Copy Process Area Click to open the Copy Process Area page to create a Process Area based on a copy of the selected Process Area.

item.title: Process Area: Object H
item.description: Process Area: Object H Process Area: Object V Use this page to [Create the Context by Adding a Wave and Creating Elements](../Use_Cases/Add_a_Wave_and_Create_Elements.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Click Waves in the Navigation pane. Click the Process Areas icon for a Wave. Click the Objects icon for a Process Area. Field Description Copy Click to open theCopy Object to Process Area page where the Process Area to which the Object is to be copied is specified.

item.title: Report Headers / Footers (Setup)
item.description: Report Headers / Footers (Setup) Use this page to [Set Headers and Footers for Transform Reports](../../Transform/Config/Set_Up_Headers_and_Footers.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > Report Headers / Footers (Setup) in the Navigation pane. Field Description DESCRIPTION Displays the name of the header or footer to be used on Transform reports.

item.title: Staged Contacts
item.description: Staged Contacts Use this page to [Assign Contacts to Objects](../Use_Cases/Add_Target_Contacts_to_Objects.htm#Assign2). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > Object Contact Configuration in the Navigation pane. Click the Bulk User Object Assignment icon in the Page toolbar. Field Description Bulk Contact Staging Area Click to open the Bulk Contact Staging Area page after contacts have been assigned to Objects.

item.title: User Context Setting
item.description: User Context Setting Use this page to [Set the Default Context for a User](../../../Platform/Sys_Admin/Use_Cases/Set_the_Default_Context_for_a_User.htm) (performed by an Administrator) or to set the user's own context. To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > User Context Setting in the Navigation pane. Field Description USER ID Displays the user ID to which the default context setting is being applied.

item.title: User Message Type
item.description: User Message Type Use this page to [Set Message Types Mapping Review](../Use_Cases/Set_Message_Types_for_Mapping_Review.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > User Message Type in the Navigation pane. Field Description USER ID Displays the name of the user who has the message type setting. A user can only set a message type for that user’s account.

item.title: Users
item.description: Users Use this page to [Add Users to the Staging Area](../Use_Cases/Add_Target_Contacts_to_Objects.htm#Add). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > Object Contact Configuration in the Navigation pane. The Users page displays in a pane to the right of the Bulk Contact Staging Area page. Field Description Add User Click to add the selected user(s) to the Bulk Contact Staging Area page as part of assigning multiple users to an Object(s).

item.title: Values
item.description: Values Use this page to [Configure List Box Values](../Use_Cases/Configure_List_Box_Values.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > List Value Configuration in the Navigation pane. Click the Values icon for a list. Field Description LIST Displays the name of the list to which this value is assigned, and the name of the label that displays next to the list box on pages in dspMigrate™ Advanced Data Migration (ADM) components.

item.title: Wave Compare for Object Results H
item.description: Wave Compare for Object Results H Wave Compare for Object Results V Use this page to [Synchronize Target Designs Across Waves](../Use_Cases/Synchronize_Target_Designs_Across_Waves.htm). NOTE: This page is only accessible if the current user is a member of the WebApp group WaveSynchronizer in Console or is assigned to a security role with access to the page. Refer to Set Security in System Administration for more information. To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar.

item.title: Wave Compare for Process Area Results H
item.description: Wave Compare for Process Area Results H Wave Compare for Process Area Results V Use this page to [Synchronize Target Designs Across Waves](../Use_Cases/Synchronize_Target_Designs_Across_Waves.htm). NOTE: This page is only accessible if the current user is a member of the WebApp group WaveSynchronizer in Console or is assigned to a security role with access to the page. Refer to Set Security in System Administration for more information. To access this page:

item.title: Wave Compare for Target Field Results H
item.description: Wave Compare for Target Field Results H Wave Compare for Target Field Results V Use this page to [Synchronize Target Designs Across Waves](../Use_Cases/Synchronize_Target_Designs_Across_Waves.htm). NOTE: This page is only accessible if the current user is a member of the WebApp group Wavesynchronizer in Console or is assigned to a security role with access to the page. Refer to Set Security in System Administration for more information. To access this page:

item.title: Wave Compare for Target Results H
item.description: Wave Compare for Target Results H Wave Compare for Target Results V Use this page to [Synchronize Target Designs Across Waves](../Use_Cases/Synchronize_Target_Designs_Across_Waves.htm). NOTE: This page is only accessible if the current user is a member of the WebApp group WaveSynchronizer in Console or is assigned to a security role with access to the page. Refer to Set Security in System Administration for more information. To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar.

item.title: Wave Gate Metrics (Value Mapping) H
item.description: Wave Gate Metrics (Value Mapping) H Wave Gate Metrics (Value Mapping) V Use this page to [Set up Wave Gate Metrics for Map](../Use_Cases/Evaluate_Mapping_with_Wave_Gate_Metrics.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Click Waves in the Navigation pane. Click the Metrics icon for a Wave. Field Description NAME Displays the Wave name.

item.title: Wave Process Area Gate Metrics (Field Mapping) H
item.description: Wave Process Area Gate Metrics (Field Mapping) H Wave Process Area Gate Metrics (Field Mapping) V Use this page to [Set up Wave Gate Metrics for Map](../Use_Cases/Evaluate_Mapping_with_Wave_Gate_Metrics.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Click Waves in the Navigation pane. Click the Process Areas icon for a Wave. Click the Metrics icon for a Process Area. Field

item.title: Wave: Process Areas H
item.description: Wave: Process Areas H Wave: Process Areas V Use this page to [Create the Contexts for Migration Projects.](../Use_Cases/Create_Contexts_for_Migration_Projects.htm) To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Click Waves in the Navigation pane. Click the Process Areas icon for a Wave. Field Description Create Milestones From Template This icon will be used in a future release.

item.title: Waves H
item.description: Waves H Waves V Use this page to [Create the Contexts for Migration Projects.](../Use_Cases/Create_Contexts_for_Migration_Projects.htm) To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Click Waves in the Navigation pane. Field Description Copy Wave Click to open the Copy Wave page to create a Wave based on the selected Wave. Create Milestones From Template

item.title: Workflow Message Summary H
item.description: Workflow Message Summary H Workflow Message Summary V Use this page to [Create Custom Workflow Messages](../Use_Cases/Create_Custom_Workflow_Messages.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > Workflow Message Summary in the Navigation pane. Field Description WORKFLOW NAME Displays the name of workflow to be processed.

item.title: Workflow Message Summary User
item.description: Workflow Message Summary User Use this page to: - [Add Users to Workflow Messages](../Use_Cases/Create_Custom_Workflow_Messages.htm#Add) - [Set up Workflow Message Summary Users](../../Map/Config/Setup_User_Notifications.htm#Set_up_Workflow_Message_Summary_Users) To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > Workflow Message Summary in the Navigation pane. Click the Users icon for the workflow name. Field Description USER ID Displays the name of the user who will receive the message.

item.title: Workflow Summary Views H
item.description: Workflow Summary Views H Workflow Summary Views V Use this page to [Register Workflow Views](../Use_Cases/Create_Custom_Workflow_Messages.htm#Register). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane, or select Console in the Context bar. Select Advanced Configuration > Workflow Message Summary in the Navigation pane. Click the Views icon for the workflow name. Field Description PRIORITY Displays the order in which the rule is run.
